item.description:
VIDEO: In Iraq, the traditional "daf", a large framed tambourine, is making a comeback after being banned under the Islamic State group. Very popular in Middle Eastern music, the instrument is especially used for religious ceremonies. pic.twitter.com/fr0bP7aYtv

VIDEO: With one of Europe's most open immigration regimes, Portugal has seen its foreign-born population double in the past five years.
